name: Electrogogic.00
description:
I don't know if I would really call this an "experimental art game" since it's not really a game, and it's not really an experiment.

Is it a digital Zen garden?

An interactive screen saver?

A creativity toy?

The video game equivalent of a prog-rock concept album?

I do not know.

But, it definitely is a thing I made.

* - Requires a 3 button mouse w/ mouse wheel to fully play.

* - This game contains flashing lights and colors, and repeating patterns. Players with photosensitivity should be cautious.
